message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY. 

This paper is about Stance Detection (StD), which is a natural language processing (NLP) task. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also discusses machine learning models and transfer learning, which are common topics in cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions the use of StD in fake news detection and argument search, which are related to information retrieval (IR) and cybersecurity (cs.CY).
